extensionDescription.message: Strelloids - Trello possibilities expander. Custom tags, colored lists, hiding the lists, scrum points, new views and much more.

settings_lists_displayMode_standard.description: Display mode option name in the select

settings_lists_displayMode_multiRows.description: Display mode option name in the select

settings_lists_displayMode_table.description: Display mode option name in the select

module_cardsSeparator_description.message: To make separator, start card title with three or more characters: - or = (eg. "--- My separator"
module_cardsSeparator_description.description: Popup - Option tooltip inside the title attribute

module_customTags_description.message: To make tag, put their name inside square brackets into card title (eg. "[tag name]")
module_customTags_description.description: Popup - Option tooltip inside the title attribute

module_scrumTime_description.message: To add estimation points for card, put it into round brackets (eg. "(3)", "(0.5)", "(?)"). To set consumption points, put it into square brackets (eg. "[5]", "[2.5]").
module_scrumTime_description.description: Popup - Option tooltip inside the title attribute

options_interval_description.message: Interval between next loops. If you change card title and eg. tags appears with to long delay, you can reduce this value. Too small value, can "warm up" your processor.

options_reset.description: Options - The title attribute for reset button
